IDEM

You are my wife. I have affection for you and with the intention of choosing you as a home in return for that love, the property listed in the schedule below has become my ancestral property. I have given you the property worth Rs. 6,86,000/- (Six lakh eighty-six thousand rupees in words) which has been in my complete possession since the date of its inheritance till today and I have given it to you free of charge and I have given you possession of it this very day. From now on, you are the full rightful owner of this property and you shall pay all the taxes due to the Sri Sarkar and enjoy it as you wish, having the rights of donation, donation, exchange, sale, and enjoyment of this property freely and freely.
Whatever obstacles may arise in the future regarding this property, whether from anyone or not, I or the residents will resolve them at my own expense and will be able to implement this property freely to you or the residents.

I hereby declare that I have not previously made any purchase, purchase agreement, court guarantee, pledge, bank loan, etc., or any other transaction that may affect the property, and that I have full rights to the property, including the boundaries, letter of permission, and occupancy. I hereby give you this settlement deed, stating that I have no right to the property.
This is not a government property. No guarantee has been given to the government or any government affiliated institution.
This property is not an assignable property as per the A.P.G. Property Transfer Prevention Act No. 9/77.

Section 22-B Registration Act - 1908
Declaration
This declaration is to inform that in the preparation of this document, I/We have taken all the necessary documents such as the details of the property in the document, 1B of the fields, coffees, link documents, tax receipts for the places and houses, details of the parties in the link document, addresses of the parties, photographs of the parties, property details etc. and have thoroughly examined all the matters and have included them in this document and have got the document prepared. No matter that should be written or included has been left out in this document. The schedule property has been physically examined and measured and the document has been drawn up. I/We declare that the said property has not been sold to anyone before, except for the sale to you, that the said property is undisputed property, that there are no dues payable on the said property, and that I/We am/are able to pay the depreciation stamp duty found during the inspection of the said property by the authorities (Registration & Stamps Revenue Department) in the future. I/We have not violated the provisions of Section 22-B of the Registration Act, 1908. And for all other matters, I/We take full responsibility, and neither the Sub-Registrar nor the Registrar of Deeds has any connection with it. If in future it is found that the property sold is not owned by the Government, Endowment, Works Board and assigns, we will be responsible for all such matters.
We have read this document in its entirety and have given our full consent in writing.
Annexure 111
Declaration
"I here by declare that property mentioned in the document belongs to me and was not
allenated earlier and if it is found to have been violated the provisions of section 22 B of
registration Act- 1908, I would be liable for penal action 82 of Registration Act, 1908”

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 1032 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Devana Srinu, in favour of his Wife, Devana Lakshmi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 73 Sq. Yds., Located nearby house no. 3-41/1, comprised in survey number 319-2, situated in Peravali Village, Gramapanchay and Mandal, erstwhile West Godavari, now within the District of East Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Tadepalligudem, is bounded as follows: North by: Panchayathi Road South by: House of Kakaraparthi Bhagyalakshmi East by: Panchayathi Road West by: Site of Challa Nagalakshmi
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible
